backend/main.mo: Defines actor with access control, data types, and CRUD logic for user profiles, coping mechanisms, check-ins, journal entries, and saved items.
feature_evidence.json: Reports feature-to-file mappings and metadata for implemented app features, tests, and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH-based color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that loads the React app entry point into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up global theme provider and full TanStack Router configuration for all app routes.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with navigation, footer, and optional profile setup modal based on user authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: A login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity authentication and clears queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: A modal prompting the user to enter and save a display name via a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: A wrapper that blocks access unless the user is authenticated, showing a sign‑in card otherwise.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders footer with attribution link, heart icon, and medical disclaimer text.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryNav.tsx: Implements responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus, icons, and user greeting.
frontend/src/content/libraryTopics.ts: Static content defining educational library topics with structured sections and bullet points.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, coping mechanisms, prompts, check-ins, and journal entries via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/CheckIn/CheckInDetail: Displays details for a single daily check-in, including scores and notes, with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckIn/CheckInPage.t: Provides a form to submit a new daily check-in and lists previous check-ins sorted by date.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page hero section and feature grid linking to major app sections.
frontend/src/pages/Journal/JournalPage.t: Allows users to create new journal entries using optional prompts and view their saved entries.
frontend/src/pages/Library/LibraryListPa: Shows a list of educational library topics with a disclaimer and links to topic details.
frontend/src/pages/Library/TopicDetailPa: Displays detailed content for a library topic and lets signed‑in users save it.
frontend/src/pages/Saved/SavedPage.tsx: Displays saved coping mechanisms and topics, handling unauthenticated states and loading conditions.
frontend/src/pages/Toolkit/ToolkitDetail: Shows detailed information about a coping mechanism, including save functionality and evidence indicators.
frontend/src/pages/Toolkit/ToolkitListPa: Lists coping mechanisms with category filtering, loading states, and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and content scanning paths.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, required images, and a list of implemented features for an app supporting ADHD women in perimenopause. Contains project versioning, design requirements, and feature definitions for navigation, UI theme, toolkit, topics, check-ins, and journaling.
